QueryItem.QueryItemText: --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- [*] Description = SELECT TOP 100 FROM GenericShearText -- [*] Parameter Generic Object Owner ID = @genericObjectOwnerID int NULL -- [*] Parameter Generic Feature Name = @genericFeatureName string NULL --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT TOP 100 * FROM R4H_testing.dbo.GenericShearText WHERE (@genericObjectOwnerID IS NULL OR GenericObjectOwnerID = @genericObjectOwnerID) AND (@genericFeatureName IS NULL OR GenericFeatureName LIKE @genericFeatureName) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
